title: 2 Easy Ways to Find Your Bookmarked Instagram Posts

steps.title: Open Instagram and tap your profile picture or icon.
steps.content: Open Instagram and tap your profile picture or icon. You'll see this in the bottom-right corner of the Instagram app. Log into your account if you aren't already. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This three-line menu icon is in the top-right corner of your screen. A menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Saved.
steps.content: Tap Saved . It's next to a bookmark icon near the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap All Posts.
steps.content: Tap All Posts . This is the default "folder" for your saved posts. If you have other collections created, tap it to navigate there now. If you want to remove a saved post , tap it to view it as a post, and then tap the Save icon again.

steps.title: Go to https://www.instagram.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.instagram.com/ in a web browser . If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address, username, or phone number and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click ☰.
steps.content: Click ☰ . This is in the bottom-left corner of the page. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Saved.
steps.content: Click Saved . You can find this underneath Your activity .

steps.title: Click All Posts.
steps.content: Click All Posts . This is the default "folder" for your saved posts. If you have other collections created, click it to navigate there now. If you want to remove a saved post, click it to view it as a post, and then click the Save icon again.
